paper_abstract: We propose an efficient algorithm for minimizing the piecewise constant Mumford-Shah functional of image segmentation. It is based on the threshold dynamics of Merriman, Bence, and Osher for evolving an interface by its mean curvature. We show that a very fast minimization can be achieved by alternating the solution of a linear parabolic partial differential equation and simple thresholding. (c) 2005 Elsevier Inc. paper_title: Threshold dynamics for the piecewise constant Mumford-Shah functional
